subject: Daytona 500 (Auto Race)
Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: In a new book, Michael Waltrip, who will drive in Sunday’s Daytona 500, discusses his life and the crash in the 2001 race that killed Dale Earnhardt.
snippet: In a new book, Michael Waltrip, who will drive in Sunday’s Daytona 500, discusses his life and the crash in the 2001 race that killed Dale Earnhardt.
